fields.title: Why I love Call of Snooty
fields.game_review: This game is so cool. I love being able to shoot people in the face with no real consequences

fields.title: SnortNite is the snortiest!
fields.game_review: All my friends play Snortnite. We shoot each other with digital weapons in a digital world. I'm addicted to my screen.

fields.title: The best murder game ever
fields.game_review: I love how much murder I get to do in this game. Just last night I murdered about 500 people. Geneva convention schmaschmeva convention.
